meaning_str.bing:
n. 【食】香蕉
网络. 香蕉女人；香蕉人；香焦

1.en: We were chatting during the whole afternoon in his studio; our topic was all the way from potted banana in the studio to female artists.
1.cn: 整个下午都在他的工作室里聊天，一路从工作室的盆栽香蕉到女艺术家。

2.en: You can try to tell people that this banana tree is an orange tree all you want, but the fruit will tell the truth.
2.cn: 你可以试图告诉人们，这棵香蕉树是一棵桔子树或一切你想说的，但果实会分辨事实。

3.en: I realized then that he had not come in search of a banana and a muffin. He came in to get warm. In his heart.
3.cn: 此时我意识到老人并非仅为得到他的香蕉和松糕而来。他是来得到温暖的，是内心所感受的那种温暖。

0.en: Banana. That's right, George. It's a banana skin.
0.cn: 香蕉。没错，乔治，那个就是香蕉皮。

1.en: That's right, George. It's a banana skin.
1.cn: 没错，乔治，那个就是香蕉皮。

2.en: Eh, strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, banana. With strawberry please.
2.cn: 额，草莓，香草，巧克力，香蕉。加点草莓。

3.en: There is one banana, one banana, three, no, four strawberries, five cherries.
3.cn: 一个香蕉，一个香蕉，三个，不，是四个草莓，五个樱桃。

4.en: Steal me the crown and all your dreams come true. Respect! Power! Banana! Banana!
4.cn: 帮我偷来皇冠，我就让你梦想成真，万众敬仰！至高权力！无穷香蕉！无穷香蕉！

5.en: Hey, look. It's a banana. Move over. Hey, I know. It's a banana. Ha-hah-ha. Yum yum. Huh?
5.cn: 嘿，看，有香蕉。让开，嘿，我知道，这是根香蕉，哈哈哈，好吃。好吃。呃?

6.en: There is one banana, one banana, three, no, four strawberries, five cherries, strawberries, cherries.
6.cn: 一个香蕉，一个香蕉，三个，不，是四个草莓，五个樱桃。草莓，樱桃。

7.en: Apples, raspberries, bananas, and more apples. An apple, raspberry, banana, and more apples smoothie.
7.cn: 苹果，树莓，香蕉，多来点苹果。苹果，树莓，香蕉，多来点苹果。

8.en: Okay. Apples, raspberries, bananas, and more apples. An apple, raspberry, banana, and more apples smoothie. Delicious.
8.cn: 好的，苹果，树莓，香蕉，多来点苹果。苹果，树莓，香蕉，多来点苹果。好喝。

9.en: I'm not sure, but I think I'm about to discover how the banana felt.
9.cn: 不知道，不过我可能就要知道那香蕉什么感觉了。

10.en: Oh and check it out, I made Marcel's favorite dish, banana cake with meal worms.
10.cn: 我做了马修最喜欢吃的菜，香蕉蛋糕，加了虫虫。

11.en: Oh, no, no, it's okay. You might slip on a banana peel and get me pregnant.
11.cn: 算了，不必了。我怕你踩到香蕉皮然后把我搞怀孕了。

12.en: Excuse me, sir. Okay, look. I got cream cheese, I got banana. You okay? Yep. Never better.
12.cn: 稍等一下，先生。瞧，我还带了香蕉，奶酪。没事吧？没事，好极了。

13.en: Why are you smashing a flash-frozen banana? Because I got a bowl of Cheerios and I couldn't find a knife.
13.cn: 你为什么要砸碎速冻香蕉？我有一碗麦片，又找不到刀子。

14.en: Coming right up, what flavors would you like? Strawberry for me please. Chocolate for me please. Banana for me please. Dinosaur.
14.cn: 过来，你们想要什么口味的？我要草莓的，谢谢。我要巧克力的。我要香蕉的。恐龙。

15.en: Can I have a cherry ice-cream? Strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, banana. With pistachio and strawberry please.
15.cn: 能给我来一个樱桃味的冰淇淋吗。额，这个是草莓，这个是香草，这个是巧克力，这个是香蕉。请在我的上面加上开心果和草莓。

16.en: Can I have a cherry ice-cream? Strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, banana. With pistachio and strawberry please.
16.cn: 能给我来一个樱桃味的冰淇淋吗？额，这个是草莓，这个是香草，这个是巧克力，这个是香蕉。请在我的上面加上开心果和草莓。

17.en: My banana birthday cake. Blow the candles out, Peppa. Hurray. Happy birthday, Peppa. Thank you, everyone. This is my best birthday ever.
17.cn: 我的香蕉生日蛋糕！把蜡烛吹灭吧佩奇。好嘞！生日快乐佩奇。谢谢你们大家！这是我过得最棒的生日了！

18.en: Anyway, I'm laying into the delivery driver, and Mitchell strolls in and says, "Oh, it's fine," and then offers him a piece of his banana loaf. I heard that.
18.cn: 我当时正在跟送货员吵架，结果米奇尔插进来说"没关系"，还给送货员一块香蕉面包。真是气人。

19.en: Hurray! My banana birthday cake! Blow the candles out, Peppa. Hurray! Happy birthday, Peppa! Thank you, everyone! This is my best birthday ever!
19.cn: 好棒啊！我的香蕉生日蛋糕！把蜡烛吹灭吧佩琪。好嘞！生日快乐佩琪。谢谢你们大家！这是我过得最棒的生日了！
